entities.name: gnome
entities.description: The text describes gnomes as small creatures that can be seen in the flower-beds and under a frozen rhododendron. They are also mentioned as wearing tutus at the top of the Christmas tree.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as someone who caught a gnome wearing a tutu at the top of the Christmas tree.

relationships.description: Scrimgeour asks Harry questions about what Dumbledore has told him.
Dumbledore is mentioned as having informed Harry about something, but the details are not disclosed.
